column5: 1. When operating new equipment for the first time I prefer to_Read the instructions
column6: 2. When seeking travel directions I_Ask for spoken directions
column7: 3. When cooking a new dish I_Call a friend for explaination
column8: 4. To teach someone something I_Demonstrate and let them have a go
column9: 5. I tend to say _I know how you feel
column11: 7. I tend to say _Watch how I do it
column12: 8. Complaining about faulty goods I tend to_Write a letter
column13: 9. I prefer these leisure activities_Music or conversation
column14: 10. When shopping generally I tend to_Try on, handle or test
column15: 11. Choosing a holiday I_Imagine the experience
column16: 12. Choosing a new car I_Discuss with friends
column17: 13. Learning a new skill_I watch what the teacher is doing
column18: 14. Choosing from a restaurant menu_I imagine what  the food will taste like
column19: 15. When listening to a band_I listen to the lyrics and the beats
column20: 16. When concentrating I_Move around a lot, fiddle with pens and pencils and touch unrelated things
column21: 17. I remember things best by_Writing notes or keeping printed details
column22: 18. My first memory is of_Being spoken to
column23: 19. When anxious I_Visualize the worst case scenarios
column24: 20. I feel especially connected to others because of_How they make me
column25: 21. When I revise for an exam, I_I talk over my notes, to myself or to other people
column26: 22. When explaining something to someone, I tend to_Show them what I mean
column27: 23. My main interests are_Photography or watching films or people watching
column28: 24. Most of my free time is spent_Watching television
column29: 25. When I first contact a new person_I talk to them on the telephone
column30: 26. I first notice how people_Sound and speak
column31: 27. If I am very angry_I keep replaying in my mind what it is that has upset me
column32: 28. I find it easiest to remember_Faces
column33: 29. I think I can tell someone is lying because_They avoid looking at you
column34: 30. When I'm meeting with an old friend_I give them a hug or a handshake
column35: Preferred learning mode_Asynchronous Online Learning (On your own time)
